title:
Integration of Quantum Key Distribution in a 20-km 32-user Coherent
  Passive Optical Network with Single Feeder Fiber
authors: Jing Wang, Brian J. Rollick, Zhensheng Jia, Bernardo A. Huberman
abstract:
We demonstrate for the first time the integration of O-band
polarization-encoding decoy-state BB84 QKD into a C-band 20-km single-feeder
fiber 32-user coherent PON running at carrier-grade power levels without
modifying existing PON infrastructures.
